TopicTitle: Typos and Bugs/Features in Game Tutorials

Articles.Content:
This doesn't seem to go in Support, as it isn't a problem on my end, and I don't see any subforum that it *would* go in. Thus, following the instructions, I put it here.

#1 problem: SAS doesn't work in the "Flight Basics" scenario, even though it tells you how to use and toggle SAS.

Second issue: Typo in text.

"But you'll eventuall start going down."

I'm on the lookout for more as we speak.
You still play the scenarios and training to figure that out wow Great bug find though.
No reason to get too indepth at finding the flaws, they are redoing the tutorials for 1.0.
The craft shown makes me cry... :'(

I also notice that the text could use some English-to-English translation... hmm.

It's a wee bit odd.
Yeah, the text could use some work. Too many commas

Yeah, the text could use some work. Too many commas

Yes, some of it is run on sentences. But use of commas, even if excessive, is better than no commas at all - which I've seen plenty of.
